definition: to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: The explosion was caused by a burst gas pipe .
sentences.chinese: 這次爆炸是由一個爆裂的煤氣管引起的。

sentences.english: Suddenly a great cracking sound split the air .
sentences.chinese: 突然，一聲巨大的爆裂聲響徹雲霄。

sentences.english: These measurements could reach an altitude of 30 kilometres before the balloon burst.
sentences.chinese: 探空氣球可升至30公里高才爆裂。

sentences.english: The battery would expose as being overcharged.
sentences.chinese: 電池充電過度可能會發生爆裂。

sentences.english: Pea pods burst open when overripe.
These are the little air-guns which contribute to make the ice crack and whoop.
sentences.chinese: 溶冰爆裂有聲，全是這些小空氣槍的花樣。

sentences.english: They were scalded by steam from the burst pipe.
sentences.chinese: 他們被爆裂的管子裏噴出的蒸汽燙傷了。

sentences.english: Fixed a problem with Fuel Synthesizer and Burst Fire.
sentences.chinese: 修正了一個燃料合成器和爆裂火焰的錯誤。

sentences.english: And bombs bursting in air, and at night the vari-color'd rockets.
sentences.chinese: 炸彈爆裂空氣，夜明顏色多變的炮膛體。

sentences.english: But it did not measurably raise the risk of the other major type, hemorrhagic stroke, in which a blood vessel leaks or bursts open.
sentences.chinese: 但沮喪不會導致出血性中風即血管泄露或血管爆裂。

sentences.english: I heard a pop, and that was his nose hitting ours.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到了爆裂聲，是他的機首撞向我們。

sentences.english: You love rabble-rousing, and you love to bust systems open.
sentences.chinese: 你們愛攪和鼓動，而且你們愛打開爆裂的系統。

sentences.english: Prevent chapping and cure chilblain with fine nature.
sentences.chinese: 觸感細膩自然，防爆裂治凍瘡。

sentences.english: It is the rotten firewood that cracks over stove fire.
sentences.chinese: 是枯柴爆裂着竈火的聲響。

sentences.english: Wait a second, so this piece of paper has that Explosive Runes spell cast on it?
sentences.chinese: 等一下，那是說這個小紙片上有施展爆裂符文法術？

definition: to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
to rupture/to fracture/to break down/(linguistics) plosion
